attributes.action: stricter regulations for the holiday and travel industry
attributes.additional_details: due to the way the travel industry treats the great british public i wish to raise this petition for the stricter regulations of holiday and travel companies, many of us have suffered at the hands of these firms who seem to be a law unto themselves changing your flight times, changing your accomodation and worst of all going to the wall at peak times, with little or no thought to the paid up in full holiday maker,, so if you are in the same frame of mind as myself please sign this e petition for parliament to look at.
